snippet: An exhibition at Japan Society shows how cats became fixtures in art, literature and folklore.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibition Life of Cats: Selections From the Hiraki Ukiyo-e Collection at Japan Society.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at Japan Society shows how cats became fixtures in art, literature and folklore.

headline.main: Review: ‘Life of Cats’ Spotlights a Centuries-Old Fascination in Japan
headline.print_headline: YouTube Darlings Have Long History in Japan’s Art
